name: Cyclic
description:
Cyclic - Made for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck In A Loop

Wander around as the animals that make up the environment's life cycle. Original music for each animal.

Lasts exactly 2 minutes 31 seconds.

Use WASD/Arrow Keys and pop some headphones on (this game is 50% music)

p.s. if you click off the game it will 100% break, oops, just keep focus on the game window and you'll be golden
